fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Culture, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives:
European chart of Human Rights and fundamental freedoms 
Multilinguism 
Justice & Home Affairs
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
a) To promote the social and political conditions needed to achieve an independent, with rule of law, social and democratic Catalan State.  
b) To bring together all the people who work for similar goals of the Catalan National Assembly, either all kinds of groups, social movements, political parties or individuals.c) c) To ease, boost and host all kinds of democratic initiatives focused on the achievement of the goals above.
relevant_communication:
Record massive peaceful demonstrations for six years in a row (2012-2017) for Catalonia's Independence. 
International events all over the world explaining the case of Catalonia's situation. 
Ongoing campaign defending elected officials against criminal prosecution for political reasons.
